title: Regulatory Compliance Workshop
description: YPG Philippines conducted a Regulatory Compliance Workshop facilitated by Atty. Lomibao, CPA to guide its officers on the various requirements needed for legal compliance of a national organization. Afterwards, the Administrative Council held its first meeting headed by the Executive Secretary, Katrice Lara, RPh.

title: PPhA Strategic Planning
description:
Last August 24-26, 2018, YPG-Philippines actively took part in the PPhA Strategic Planning for the years 2018-2020 at Las Cas Filipinas de Acuzar in Bagac, Bataan. Together with PPhA former and present Board of Trustees, Council of Advisers and Affiliate Organization Presidents and Representatives, the group formulated recommendations for strategies towards achieving the vision and mission of PPhA as an association. Initial plans and proposals for the Centennial Celebration of PPhA set on the year 2020 were also tackled.

The YPG-Philippines delegation to the strategic planning was headed by our President Meg Gutierrez, RPh. In attendance as well were our Membership Coordinator, Alexander Lim , and our Communications and Media Relations Officer, Diana Dalisay Orolfo , RPh.

title: YPG Bataan Chapter Formation
description:
Today the YPG Philippines President, Ms. Meg Gutierrez personally awarded the YPG Bataan Chapter their certificate of formation. The certificate was received by their president, Ms. Erika Marteja and their officers.

Welcome to the family #IDEALPharmacists of YPG Bataan Chapter!

title: YPG Tarlac Relaunch
description:
To YPG Philippines, lets wholeheartedly welcome #idealPharmacists of YPG Tarlac Chapter.

Congratulations YPG Tarlac.

title: Strategic Planning
description: The 2018 YPG Strategic Planning was attended by YPG National Officers 2018-2020 at Parque Espana Residence Hotel on July 21-22, 2018. Activities conducted include leadership workshop, turnover ceremony and oath taking, and strategic planning.
